text: pasuva æyata “mema maligavata ætulu vanu” yayi kiyanu læbuvaya. æya eya dutu avasthavedi (polovehi patita kara tibu palingu), jalaya yayi sita ænduma (notemi sitinu pinisa) valalukaren (podiyak) osava gattaya. (suleyiman “eya vatura nova) palingu patita kara æti maligavaki” yayi pævasuveya. eyata æya “mage deviyane! niyata vasayenma ma matama haniyak kara ganimin sitiyemi. lokayanhi deviyan vana allahta, suleyiman samaga mamat sampurnayenma avanata vannemi” yayi pævasuvaya
